patthana9.15:1.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanadassanena pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.15:2.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.15:3.1.pli: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.15:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.15:5.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.15:6.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana9.15:7.1.pli: Nasavitakkaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naavitakkaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasavicāraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naavicāraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasappītikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naappītikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… napītisahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanapītisahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasukhasahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanasukhasahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naupekkhāsahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanaupekkhāsahagataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.15:8.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana9.15:9.1.pli: Nakāmāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanakāmāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… narūpāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanarūpāvacaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.15:10.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.

patthana9.15:12.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.15:13.1.pli: Napariyāpannaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naapariyāpannaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.15:14.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.15:15.1.pli: Naniyyānikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naaniyyānikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana9.15:16.1.pli: Naniyataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naaniyataṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.15:17.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.15:18.1.pli: Nasauttaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naanuttaraṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.15:19.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.15:20.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana9.15:21.1.pli: Naaraṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo ca naaraṇo nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana9.15:22.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ nakusalañca naaraṇaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.15:23.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.15:24.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.15:26.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana9.15:27.1.pli: Naaraṇaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.15:28.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve.

patthana9.16:1.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṃ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṃ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.16:2.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.16:3.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.16:5.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve.

patthana9.16:6.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ naupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.16:7.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana9.16:8.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.17:1.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana9.17:2.1.pli: Naaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana9.17:3.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.17:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.17:5.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana9.17:6.1.pli: Naaraṇaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana9.17:7.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca naaraṇaṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.17:8.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.17:10.1.pli: Nasaraṇaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.17:11.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye kamme …pe… magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṃ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana9.2:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.2:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.2:5.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.3:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ navipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipāke ekaṃ.)

patthana9.3:16.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)

patthana9.3:17.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)

patthana9.3:18.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)

patthana9.3:19.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)

patthana9.3:20.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava.)

patthana9.3:21.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)

patthana9.4:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nanevaācayagāmiṃ nāpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)

patthana9.4:18.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)

patthana9.5:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana9.5:2.1.pli: Nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana9.5:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.5:5.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana9.5:6.1.pli: Nanahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana9.5:7.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca nanahetuṃ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.5:8.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… sampayuttavārepi sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana9.5:9.1.pli: Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nanahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nanahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca nanahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana9.5:10.1.pli: Nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.5:11.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava …pe… upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Pañhāvāraṃ evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana9.5:12.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.5:13.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye kamme …pe… magge ekaṃ, vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṃ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana9.6:1.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe… dve mahābhūte …pe… nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca sahetukā khandhā. Nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo ca naahetuko nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana9.6:2.1.pli: Naahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana9.6:3.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ nakusalañca naahetukaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.6:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.

patthana9.6:5.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana9.6:6.1.pli: Naahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana9.6:7.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ naakusalañca naahetukaṃ naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.6:8.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.

patthana9.6:9.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana9.6:10.1.pli: Naahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana9.6:11.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ naabyākatañca naahetukaṃ naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.6:12.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.7:1.1.pli: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo ca naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana9.7:2.1.pli: Naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana9.7:3.1.pli: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalañca naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.7:5.1.pli: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.7:7.1.pli: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.8:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.8:2.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.

patthana9.8:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.8:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.

patthana9.8:5.1.pli: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Ekapañhameva. Etena upāyena kusalākusaladukaṃ kusalattikameva ettha vaṭṭati.)

patthana9.9:4.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana9.9:5.1.pli: Nasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.9:6.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana9.9:7.1.pli: Narūpiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naarūpiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.9:8.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana9.9:9.1.pli: Nalokiyaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nalokuttaraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana9.9:10.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana9.9:11.1.pli: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanakenaci viññeyyaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
